content.en: Motor control algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms in the control and observation of induction motors. These algorithms, such as sliding mode observers and controllers, are employed to improve efficiency, speed control, torque and flux tracking, and sensorless control of induction motors. The studies highlight the effectiveness of these algorithms in enhancing the performance and robustness of induction motor drives.
content.da: Motorstyringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til styring og overvågning af induktionsmotorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom sliding mode-observatører og -regulatorer, anvendes for at forbedre effektivitet, hastighedskontrol, moment- og fluxsporing samt sensorløs kontrol af induktionsmotorer. Undersøgelserne fremhæver disse algoritmers effektivitet i at forbedre ydeevnen og robustheden af induktionsmotordrev.
